overview: Part porn flick and part documentary, shot on location in Brazil, this has a bit of everything. Bobbi Starr is a dynamo that wreakd havoc on pussies and dicks alike. Bobbi Starr is the most recognizable pornstar in the cast, that's mostly made up of Brazilian pornstars.
tagline: Ever wonder what it would be like to go to Rio with a bunch of Porno Stars?
title: Rio Loco
